Introducing the newly expanded myChevrolet mobile app, redesigned with new capabilities to provide the ideal vehicle ownership experience.  The app now includes the added benefit of connectivity for vehicles equipped with OnStar.  Get the app to enjoy the full potential of your Chevrolet. You’ll need your onstar.com or my.chevrolet.com username and password to login.

We update myChevrolet regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version so you get all of the available features and improvements. This update has changes for iOS 10 compatibility, enhancements to allow drivers of electric vehicles to easily find and navigate to charge stations, some minor bug fixes, and the ability to share your navigation destination with Apple Maps.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance.

What’s New:
• “How Things Work” videos to show how to use features available on your Chevrolet
• Digital Owner Manuals now contain full content and are searchable in the app (2008 or newer vehicles)
• Locate Vehicle feature now available in both the Navigation and Parked Location cards (available to eligible US OnStar subscribers)
• Forgot username/password process improved
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We've added the following features in this release:
• Touch ID support has now been added to augment the OnStar PIN
• 3D Touch support has been added for users with access to Remote Commands
• Apple Watch support has been added for OnStar customers with access to Remote Commands
• Use Apple Watch to obtain walking, driving, or transit directions to your vehicle’s Parked Location (for subscribed users)
• Set preferences for delivery of key OnStar alerts – including Wi-Fi® Data Usage Alerts, your vehicle’s OnStar Vehicle Diagnostics Email, or Theft Alert Notifications (found in App Settings)
• Energy Awareness feature addition for Bolt EV customers
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Set preferences for delivery of key OnStar alerts – including Wi-Fi® Data Usage Alerts, your vehicle’s OnStar Vehicle Diagnostics Email, or Theft Alert Notifications (found in App Settings)
• Energy Awareness feature addition for Bolt EV customers
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We've added the following features in this release:

OnStar AtYourService will now present location-based promotions and offers within the myChevrolet app
Parked Location now links to Apple Maps to provide walking directions to your vehicle’s approximate location
Monitor and edit existing, scheduled service appointments for your vehicle
Chevrolet Bolt EV owners can now forecast range to a given destination, and schedule charging stops along the way
Chevrolet Bolt EV owners can now use KeyPass to update charge management settings
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:

OnStar AtYourService is now called Marketplace—this feature brings members location-based promotions and offers within the myChevrolet app

Explore/shop for accessories specific to your vehicle

Track the status of your service appointment; the app will notify you when your vehicle is checked in (if you drop off your vehicle), is being inspected, is pending your approval on an additional service item, and when your vehicle is ready to be picked up

Contact a Chevrolet or OnStar Advisor via Facebook Messenger

Bug fixes and minor enhancements

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
The Vehicle Status section now includes additional information for diesel vehicle owners. Users with real-time diagnostics can monitor Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) levels, which now includes information on optimal, low, or, or critically low levels that would limit vehicle operation.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:

Chevrolet Smart Driver: Get information and tips to help you improve your driving

Schedule Service: View your vehicle’s required maintenance schedule in the app and conveniently schedule your next appointment

My Chevrolet Rewards: Learn about/enroll in the program, see your active point balance, and conveniently access your account

We update our app regularly to add features and improve performance. Included in this release:
Marketplace got a refresh, including the ability to pair merchant accounts (i.e., Shell, Dunkin, Yelp, etc.) with your Connected Services account via mobile—allowing you to easily take advantage of transacting with your favorite merchants directly from your vehicle dash.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
With the Service Recommendation feature, customers can be made aware of service recommendations based on their vehicle’s health, service history, open recalls, and maintenance schedules, and can conveniently schedule these services via the mobile app.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
Now, customers will be able to use their myChevrolet app in Apple CarPlay* so they can interact with some of the app’s features through the vehicle’s infotainment screen.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
*This feature is available on select 2017, 2018 and 2019 models. Visit my.chevrolet.com/learnAbout/mychevroletapp for more information.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
View your vehicle’s range and available charging stations on a map in Apple CarPlay through Energy Assist for Bolt vehicles.
En Route Monitoring for Bolt vehicles in Apple CarPlay provides information on whether a specific route is in range, allowing customers to adjust their route in real-time.
Through the Vehicle Locate feature, members or their specified contacts can view the vehicle’s location on a map, and create arrival and departure alerts. Notification preferences can be set via the mobile app. Requires a paid Connected Services plan.
***Vehicle Locate service is designed to locate OnStar-equipped vehicles, not people. May require a paid service plan. Services are subject to user terms and limitations and vary by vehicle model.

Marketplace got a refresh, including the ability to pair merchant accounts (i.e., Shell, Dunkin, Yelp, etc.) with your Connected Services account via mobile—allowing you to easily take advantage of transacting with your favorite merchants directly from your vehicle dash.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
Manually add a contact, or select a contact from your device’s contact list, to receive notifications by text when your vehicle has arrived at a pre-determined destination.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
View your vehicle’s approximate address on a map when the “Find Vehicle” command is executed.^
Trailering features include creating, managing, and sharing your trailer profile, as well as creating custom checklists and trailer maintenance reminder alerts.^^
^ U.S., Canada, and Mexico only. Requires select paid plan. Service is designed to locate compatible connected vehicles. Eligibility varies by vehicle model. Functionality varies by mobile device. Message and data rates may apply. Requires contact method on file and enrollment to receive alerts. User terms and limitations apply. See onstar.com for details.
^^Device data connection required. Available on select Apple devices. Some features require active service plan and working electrical system. Requires contact method on file and enrollment to receive alerts. Service availability, features and functionality vary by vehicle. User terms and limitations apply.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
iN Command® allows you to Bluetooth pair your RV and view certain aspects of your RV such as floorplan information. Capabilities will vary based on trailer manufacturer, model, and installed options*.
iN Command® is provided by ASA Electronics and designed to operate within 30 feet of trailers equipped with iN Command® Control Systems with Global ConnectTM via Bluetooth. Use through the myGMC mobile app requires active service plan. Terms and limitations apply.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following features in this release:
Remotely personalize your vehicle’s radio by pre-selecting your preferred in-vehicle apps
View the direction your vehicle is travelling with Vehicle Locate
Access your Payment History from the Account section of the app
View your vehicle’s location and charge state through Energy Assist
With EVgo, you can easily monitor charging stations along your route

Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Remotely add, delete, and reorder your favorite AM/FM/SXM radio stations that appear on your vehicle’s infotainment screen. *

View your SXM account information under the Plan Info page. *

Reset your password and PIN directly through the mobile app.

Bug fixes and minor enhancements

*US only. Available on select 2017 model year vehicles and newer with compatible hardware. Requires a paid Connected Services plan, mobile app, and a paid AT&T vehicle data plan. Mobile app is available on select Apple and Android devices. Device data connection required. Terms apply. See onstar.com for details and limitations. Certain features require a SiriusXM subscription. See siriusxm.com for details and limitations.

We update our app regularly to add new features and improve performance. We’ve added the following feature in this release:

Family Sharing: You can invite Family Members to share access to your connected vehicle to monitor, maintain and use features like remotely unlocking and starting your vehicle, viewing vehicle health and location information, and more. You can share vehicles with up to 8 Members. Learn more by visiting your "Account" in the mobile app.

You asked and we took action. Now you can enjoy the newly redesigned myChevrolet mobile app with these features:
- Send remote commands and check your vehicle’s status from your home screen
- Enroll in myChevrolet Rewards through your app and start earning points today

The updates to your home screen are just the start. Be sure to be on the lookout for more future updates to your mobile app.
This update also contains miscellaneous bug fixes.
